summary: Completed comprehensive testing of New Appointment form redesign and Upcoming/Today page updates. All 25 test cases passed (100% frontend success). The form now has correct section order, all specified fields with search icons, Branch dropdown filters to Aftersales only, time slot popover with disabled 1:00 PM and 1:30 PM slots, PMS interval sub-dropdown appears when PMS is selected, and DocketReady switch is NOT present as required.
passed_tests: Today page (/customer-relations/appointment) does NOT have 'New Appointment' button
Upcoming page (/customer-relations/upcoming) has 'New Appointment' button in header
Upcoming page shows 'UPCOMING' heading
Upcoming page shows 'Future scheduled appointments' subtitle
Upcoming page shows 'Coming Soon' placeholder
Clicking 'New Appointment' on Upcoming navigates to /new-appointment
New Appointment page shows 4 sections in correct order: Vehicle Information, Customer Information, Required Information, Additional Details
Vehicle Information: Registration No field with search icon present
Vehicle Information: VIN field with search icon present
Vehicle Information: Engine Number field present
Vehicle Information: Model field present
Vehicle Information: Current KM field present
Clicking search icon on Registration No shows toast 'No linked data found.'
Clicking search icon on VIN shows toast 'No linked data found.'
Customer Information: Customer Name (required) field present
Customer Information: Phone Number (required) field present
Customer Information: Email (optional) field present
Required Information: Branch dropdown shows only Aftersales branches (Siliguri, Coochbehar)
Required Information: Time slot popover shows 13 slots from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Time slot: 1:00 PM (13:00) is disabled
Time slot: 1:30 PM (13:30) is disabled
Time slot: Selecting 11:00 AM shows it in the trigger button
Service Type dropdown shows: 1FS, 2FS, 3FS, PMS, RR, BP, Other
Selecting PMS reveals 'PMS Interval' dropdown with options 30K PMS through 200K PMS
Additional Details: DocketReady switch is NOT present (only OTS/Recall, Priority, Recovered)
Back button navigates back
Cancel button navigates back
Sidebar shows: Today, Upcoming, History, Vehicles under Customer Relations
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Used existing test data.
context_for_next_testing_agent: New Appointment form fully redesigned and working. Sections in order: Vehicle → Customer → Required → Additional. Branch dropdown filters to Aftersales type only (Siliguri, Coochbehar). Time slots 1:00 PM and 1:30 PM are disabled. PMS selection shows PMS Interval sub-dropdown with 18 options (30K-200K PMS). DocketReady switch removed. Search icons on Registration No and VIN show MOCKED toast 'No linked data found.' Today page has no New Appointment button; Upcoming page has it with Coming Soon placeholder.

mocked_apis.Registration No search: Shows toast 'No linked data found.' (UI only, no backend search)
mocked_apis.VIN search: Shows toast 'No linked data found.' (UI only, no backend search)
